SEARCH
Package it.polimi.it.model.Board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.it.model.Board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
B2P, B3P, B4P
public abstract class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Matrix that represents the LivingRoom of the game. Abstract class, gets extended by B2P, B3P and B4P, according to the number of players. Contains various methods to check, fill and take tiles from the 'LivingRoom'.
See Also:

    • getMatrix

      public Tile[][] getMatrix()
      Getter method
      Returns:
      the LivingRoom's tiles matrix.

    • refill

      public boolean refill()
      Checks if a refill of the board is needed calling method checkRefill Eventually refills the board, extracting random tiles from the TilesBag

    • checkRefill

      public Boolean checkRefill()
      Given the Board matrix, checks if a refill is needed.
      Returns:
      a boolean value which is true if the boards needs a refill, false otherwise

    • findMaxAdjacent

      public int findMaxAdjacent(int maxFromShelfie)
      Finds the maximum number of Tiles that can be taken from the board
      Parameters:
      maxFromShelfie - is the maximum number of tiles that can be contained in the columns of the player's Shelfie
      Returns:
      the maximum number of Tiles that can be taken from the board, this number can't be higher than maxFromShelfie

    • removeTiles

      public void removeTiles(List<Tile> chosenTiles)
      Removes the tiles that the player chose to take from the board Given the coordinate (row and column of the Tiles in the board)
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - is a list of tiles in which are stored the Tiles chosen by the player

    • choosableTiles

      public List<List<Tile>> choosableTiles(int size)
      Given the number of Tiles that a player wants to take from the board, Returns every combination of Tiles that can be taken following the rules of the game Eventually calls addTilesToTriplet
      Parameters:
      size - is the number of Tiles that the player wants to take from the board
      Returns:
      a List that contains a List of Tiles
